model.interfaces.policies

Interface Policy


  • public interface Policy
    The policy interface describes action and behaviour constraints on entities in the Sea of Stuff. Types of policies: - where data goes - where computation goes - caching - location algorithms - duplication: stores data on multiple nodes to ensure reliability and fault tolerance determines the nodes where replicas are placed. Params: replication factor. - cores - bandwidth - load balancing - failure handling retrying failed operations. use alternative solutions on failures. - data recovery
    Author:
    Simone I. Conte "sic2@st-andrews.ac.uk"
    See Also:
    SeaOfStuff
